intro.title: Software Developer
intro.description: Interested in web development and computer graphics programming, I’m looking for a job where I can contribute with my skills in C++, Python or Javascript (React, Node.js).

experiences.name: SmartShoot
experiences.title: Software Developer Junior in an English-speaking team
description: SmartShoot is a Californian company, leader in connecting professional photographers with major clients such as UberEats and Airbnb.
In an Agile team, I developed web applications in Vue.js / Python with the Pyramid framework. I worked also on developing unitary and functional test environment for Smartshoot platform.

experiences.name: Epitech
experiences.title: Teaching Assistant & Student Coach
description: Part-time assistant for the follow-up of junior students.
My job was to supervise students, correct their personal projects, and coach project teams.
To achieve this mission, I had the opportunity to follow 3 trainings, validated by a certification (Teaching & Coaching).

experiences.name: ForCity
experiences.title: Modeling Python Developer in an "Agile" team
description: ForCity is a French start-up, providing modeling and simulation tools to optimize the cities' resources: Heating, Waste, ...
As a Python developer, I took part in the waste management modeling team for the metropole of Lyon.
I worked on interaction in modeling and cartographic management tools.

experiences.name: Valraiso
experiences.title: AI Research Assistant & React developer
description: Valraiso is an e-commerce engineering company, working in the field of mountain tourism.
I worked as an AI engineer in the R&D department. I implemented clustering and Machine Learning techniques for a marketing application.
Then I developed this application, helping clients to choose a ski trip, in React / Node.js.

experiences.name: Kitware
experiences.title: R&D Engineer - VTK Development team
description: Kitware provides open source software for visualization, computer vision  and technical software​.
In the scientific visualisation department, my mission was to improve the multithreading tools in the VTK open source library.

educations.name: Epitech
educations.title: Master of Computer Sciences
description: Epitech is an engineering school for IT expertise and innovation. The program lasts 5 years.
The pedagogy is active, inductive and project-based.
The team work develops values of solidarity, communication and autonomy.

educations.name: Ionis STM
educations.title: Teaching & Coaching Diploma
description: I followed three weeks of training with specialists in education and pedagogy, along with a 18 months internship at Epitech.

educations.name: Heriot-Watt
educations.title: Master in Artificial Intelligence
description: Accademic training in English in the fields of AI, Big Data, Graphics Computation
The subject of my master thesis was: "Emails Classification using Natural Language Processing and Classification Techniques".

projects.name: MarioScene
projects.title: OpenGL scene in CPP with Mario Bros. theme
description: This school project was my first in OpenGL and its purpose was to get acquainted with the technology. The goal was to display different 3D models with lighting effects and animations
I was inspired by the models of Mario Bros. (made with Maya Autodesk)

projects.name: A-MAZing
projects.title: OpenGL project with physic simulation, boids and pathfinding.
description: This school project was part of my Computer Graphics class at Heriot Watt.
We had to implement multiple components: particule explosion, rigid body physics, crowd and A* search.

projects.name: Paperfly
projects.title: Boids model simulated with Vulkan API.
description: The aim of this small project was to discover the Vulkan API.
I implemented the Boids model (swarm of birds simulation) represented with paper airplanes.
